website_summaries.verdict: Has a higher clearance than other cutters, so it can be used to cut thicker materials. Its cutting surface is not as wide, though, so consider what you want to make.
pros: Includes auto blade, cutting mat, one-month subscription to Silhouette store equal to $25 in downloads
Can cut through thicker materials than other machines
cons: Smaller cutting surface than other machines

customer_reviews.title: Love it- got it new
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant due to some of the negative comments stating they had received a used item. Mine was definitely new, was fully packaged and taped. Love the printer! a few quick youtube tutorials and i was up and running. a few things i wish i would have known: 1) to take the autoblade in and out, you have to pull the little ring tab OUT and then it will come out. similarly, you have to make sure it snaps IN to fully secure it 2) just put the autoblade in and let it do it's thing. don't worry about doing manual settings. the presets have been good for all my projects so far

product_meta.title: Silhouette America Portrait 2 Vinyl Cutting Machine
product_meta.description: The Silhouette Portrait is an electronic cutting machine for personal use. Like a home printer, it plugs into your PC or Mac with a simple USB cable. However, instead of printing, it uses a small blade to cut paper, cardstock, vinyl, fabric, and other material up to 8 inches wide and 10 feet long. The Silhouette Portrait 2 features Bluetooth technology (US, Canada, EU only) and is compatible with Silhouettes new AutoBlade. The machine also has the ability to register and cut printed materials and is PixScan compatible. The Silhouette Portrait 2 also has a higher 2 mm clearance, so it is compatible with the deep-cut blade.
feature_bullets: Silhouette Portrait 2 with Bluetooth and Autoblade
Cuts a variety of materials including: cardstock, fabric, heat transfer material, transparencies, paper, vellum, adhesive vinyland magnet paper
Mac and PC compatible software included
Note: Kindly refer user manual before use
